section.name: Project Coverage
section.p: Project Coverage is the main Coverage analysis point for Test Coverage, allowing you to run all tests in your project and see the resulting Coverage analysis. Apart from the standard Coverage panel, the toolbar includes a Run/Cancel/Progress bar that will run all TestSuites in the current project, continuously updating coverage as they execute.
The bottom of the panel has been extended with a "Run Log" inspector which shows ongoing output from the running TestSuites/TestCases
